column1: Great for kids,I love it,I like this app because it has so much for kids to do and learn,My daughter loves this app she has improved in school from this app. I recommend every parent download this app. I've had this app for 2 years in I really think who ever created this did an amazing job.,This app is just awesome with up to 9 subject areas all accessible for free.
